profil.title: Hello, I'm Yifan
profil.description:
☆ Currently seeking opportunities for 2025 campus recruitment (expected to receive graduation certificate around February 2025)

☆ Holding a Master's degree in the field of Computer Science and a Bachelor's degree in Management. My study abroad experience has provided me with excellent English and French language skills, enabling cross-cultural communication and collaboration with international teams.

☆ Technically proficient with a deep understanding of business requirements. Skilled in communication, team coordination, and inter-team collaboration. Passionate about new technologies, always staying updated with industry trends, and eager to continuously learn new skills and embrace challenges to improve myself.

☆ Excited to embark on my first official professional journey, dedicating my skills and passion to a challenging and opportunity-rich work environment!

master.title: Master's Degree in Computer-related Fields (MIAGE: Computer Science Methods Applied to Business Management)
master.university: Computer Science Institute | University of Toulouse 1
master.specialization1: M2 Second Year Master: MIAGE IPM (Business Process Engineering)
master.courses: Key Courses: Dynamic Web Application Development, Information Systems Analysis and Design (UML), Business Process Modeling (BPMN), Object-Oriented Programming (JAVA), Machine Learning Fundamentals, Agile Management, etc.
master.specialization2: M1 First Year Master: MIAGE IM (Business Engineering)
master.courses2: Key Courses: Website Design (HTML, CSS, JS), Business Intelligence System Models and Methods (OLAP, Power BI, Talend, etc.), Database Development (MySQL, Oracle, etc.), Python Data Analysis, Project Management, etc.

preparatory.title: MIAGE Master's Preparatory Program
preparatory.university: Computer Science Institute | University of Toulouse 1
preparatory.courses: Key Courses: French Language, Information System Architecture and Design, Java Fundamentals, SQL Basics, Access Database, Project Management, etc.

bachelor.title: Bachelor's Degree in Human Resource Management
bachelor.university: School of Labor Economics | Capital University of Economics and Business
bachelor.courses: Key Courses: Management, Microeconomics, Macroeconomics, Management Information Systems, Accounting, Human Resources Management-related Professional Courses, etc.
bachelor.gpa: GPA: 88.52/100. Recipient of University-level First-Class Scholarship, Outstanding League Member, etc.

exchange.title: Exchange Student
exchange.courses: Key Courses: Management Accounting for Decision Making, Human Resources Management, Business Information Systems, Statistics for Business and Economics, etc.

competences.title: My Skills
competences.softSkillsText: As a travel enthusiast who has traveled independently multiple times, I have developed strong adaptability and problem-solving skills through exploring different cultural backgrounds. These experiences have broadened my perspective, deepening my understanding and respect for world diversity. Additionally, I love sports and photography, passionate about capturing beautiful moments in life. Outgoing and enthusiastic, I excel in communication with exceptional empathy, expression, and interpersonal skills. In team collaboration, I can effectively coordinate and manage, actively driving project progress, ensuring team efficiency, and successfully achieving project goals.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me anytime!
